mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall.mall_tb_order ( TRADE_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, SKU_ID, PROPERTIES_NAME, PRICE, `CHANGE`, POINTS, QUANTITY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) (SELECT #{tradeId}, t.item_id, t.item_name, #{skuId}, q.properties_name, CASE WHEN q.price IS NULL THEN t.price ELSE q.price END, 0, 0, #{quantity}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} FROM dms.dms_tb_item t LEFT JOIN( SELECT qq.item_id, qq.properties_name, qq.price FROM dms.dms_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state = 'U' AND qq.sku_id = #{skuId}) q ON t.item_id = q.item_id WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #{shopId} AND t.item_id = #{itemId} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.points, t.change, t.item_id AS itemId, t.sku_id AS skuId, CASE WHEN q.stock IS NULL THEN p.stock ELSE q.stock END AS stock FROM mall.mall_tb_order t LEFT JOIN dms.dms_tb_item p ON t.item_id = p.item_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT qq.sku_id, qq.stock FROM dms.dms_tb_item_sku qq WHERE qq.state = 'U') q ON t.sku_id = q.sku_id WHERE p.item_id is not null AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.shop_id = #{shopId} AND t.trade_id = #{tradeId}

SELECT t.order_id AS orderId, t.item_name AS itemName, t.properties_name AS propertiesName, t.quantity, t.price, t.points, t.change FROM mall.mall_tb_order t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND t.order_id = #{orderId}
